summary: Build a professional VRShivaji Construction business website showcasing services and offerings.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Construction company wordmark logo, clean geometric style, dark charcoal with safety-orange accent (vrshivaji-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero banner image/illustration of a modern construction site with subtle gradient overlay, professional and minimal (construction-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a multi-section marketing website for “VRShivaji Construction” that clearly showcases the business, its services, and what it offers, with responsive layouts for mobile/tablet/desktop.

Implement core website pages/sections in English: Home (hero + highlights), Services (service list with short descriptions), Why Choose Us (differentiators), Projects/Portfolio (example project cards), About (company overview), and Contact (address/phone/email placeholders + inquiry form).
Add an inquiry submission flow: the Contact form should validate required fields, submit to the backend canister, and show success/error states.
Apply a single coherent “professional construction” visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and components) using a distinctive style that is not blue/purple.
Add static brand visuals (generated assets) and use them in the UI: a logo and a hero image/illustration suitable for a construction company.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a professional VRShivaji Construction business website that showcases services and offerings.
Backend: store contact inquiries in stable memory with timestamp and provide a read method for retrieving inquiries (for future admin use).
